Pre-K Sight Words.subhead: The Dolch Pre-primer Sight Words list
Pre-K Sight Words.supporting: Educator Dr. Edward William Dolch developed the list in the 1930s-40s by studying the most frequently occurring words in children's books of that era. The list contains 220 “service words” plus 95 high-frequency nouns.
